#include <iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,k;
		long long sum=0;
		vector<int> v;
		cin>>n>>k;
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		int len=1;
		int flag=0;
		for(int i=0;i<s.length()-1;i++)
		{
			if(s[i]==s[i+1])
			{
			 len++;
			}
			else
			{
		     	if(len>=k)
		    	flag=1;
			 v.push_back(len);
			 len=1;
			 
			}
			
		}
		if(s[s.length()-1]!=s[s.length()-2])
		{
		if(len>=k)
		    	flag=1;
		   v.push_back(1); 	
		}
			else
			{
		if(len>=k)
		    	flag=1;
			v.push_back(len);
			}
			

		
		
		if(!flag)
		cout<<"-1"<<endl;
		else
		{
		for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++)
		{
			
			sum+=(ceil((double)v[i]/k));
			
		}
		cout<<sum<<endl;
		
		}
		
		
	}
	
}
